formula: G.f.: x*(4+5*x)/(1-x^2) [From _Jaume Oliver Lafont_, Mar 20 2009]a(n)=(9/2)+[(-1)^n]/2-5*[C(2*n,n) mod 2], with n>=0 [From _Paolo P. Lava_, Mar 31 2009]
mathematica: Join[{0},RealDigits[1/22,10,120][[1]]] (* or *) CoefficientList[ Series[ x (4+5x)/(1-x^2),{x,0,120}],x] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 29 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
